sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Button, Container, Grid, Paper } from '@mui/material';
import Lottie from 'lottie-react';
import healthcareAnimation from '../assets/healthcare-lottie.json';

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <Box sx={{ bgcolor: '#f5f6fa', minHeight: '100vh', py: 6 }}>
      <Container maxWidth="md">
        <Paper elevation={3} sx={{ p: 4, mb: 4, textAlign: 'center' }}>
          <Grid container spacing={4} alignItems="center">
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Typography variant="h3" gutterBottom color="primary.main">
                Welcome to HealthCare Platform
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="h6" color="text.secondary" gutterBottom>
                Book appointments, connect with doctors online or in-person, and manage your health easily.
              </Typography>
              <Button variant="contained" color="primary" size="large" href="/login" sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
                Get Started
              </Button>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
              <Lottie animationData={healthcareAnimation} style={{ height: 300 }} />
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Paper>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Paper elevation={2} sx={{ p: 3, textAlign: 'center' }}>
              <Typography variant="h6" color="primary">Book Online</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">Find doctors and book appointments instantly.</Typography>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Paper elevation={2} sx={{ p: 3, textAlign: 'center' }}>
              <Typography variant="h6" color="primary">Telemedicine</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">Join secure video calls for remote consultations.</Typography>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Paper elevation={2} sx={{ p: 3, textAlign: 'center' }}>
              <Typography variant="h6" color="primary">In-Person Visits</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">Visit clinics with real-time directions and info.</Typography>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Home;
